1.0.0.en: * First release with support for IO vertical exterior blinds and Sunis IO wire free sensor

1.0.1.en: * Because of a difference in blind states between TaHoma and Homey, sometimes it wasn't possible to open halfway closed blinds after a sync with TaHoma cloud or a cloud sync would open the blinds when the user had closed the blinds half way. This is now fixed.

1.0.2.en:
* A user defined action (which is in progress), can no longer be overwritten by another action through cloud sync.
* Fixed an issue that would crash the app, if the response from the TaHoma API was in the wrong format.

1.0.3.en: * Fixed an issue that would crash the app, if there was an error response from TaHoma.

1.1.0.en: * Added support for the Somfy Thermis WireFree IO sensor.

1.2.0.en: * App is now compatible with SDK 2.

1.3.0.en:
* Added support for IO roller shutters.
* Added support for Velux IO roof windows.
* Added support for Velux IO blinds.

1.3.1.en: * Added support for IO horizontal awnings.

1.3.2.en:
* Added support for IO exterior venetian blinds.
* The roller shutters device supports low speed management motors as well.

1.3.3.en: * Added an icon for the IO exterior venetian blinds.

1.3.4.en:
* Changed app store assets
* Optimized code for a better performance

1.3.5.en: * Ability to log out of the TaHoma service was added.

1.3.6.en: * Fixed a bug that would crash the app.

1.3.7.en: * Fixed a bug that would cause the temperature of the Thermis to be incorrect.

1.4.0.en: * Added support for the IO Opening Detector.*Added synchronization speed preference to the settings screen.This enables the user to choose their own synchronization time between Homey and TaHoma.The default time is 10 seconds.

1.5.0.en: * App is now compatible with Homey V2.*Added support for Velux IO exterior roller shutters.*Apart from setting the window covering state to open or closed, it is now also possible to use a slider to set it to a specific position, in order to use this new feature it is necessary to remove and add the device in Homey.*App is also compatible with the Somfy Connexoon.

1.5.1.en: * Fixed a bug where the opening / closing of the IO horizontal awnings would be reversed.

1.5.3.en:
* Fixed a bug where the up and down buttons of the window coverings devices wouldn't respond.
*Improved app performance.

1.5.4.en: * Fixed a bug where the movement of the window coverings devices would suddenly stop.

1.6.0.en:
* Added Somfy One Alarm.
* Added Outdoor Camera Light Controller.
* Enocean Window Handle (requires Enocean USB module).

1.6.1.en:
* Added Somfy receiver IZYMO io shutter.
* Added Somfy io motion sensor.
* Merged Anders fix from GitHub for horizontal awnings issue.

1.6.2.en: * Added RTS dual curtains, blinds and venetian blinds.

1.6.3.en:
* Added MY button and flow action to RTS venetian blind.
* Added Interior io vertical blind

1.6.5.en: * Added a data log to the app configuration screen to make it easier to provide the data required to add a new device.

1.6.6.en:
* Added a Quiet Mode for io:RollerShutterWithLowSpeedManagementIOComponent.
* Tidy up of old code.

1.6.7.en:
* Separated Roller Shutter Quiet (io) from other Roller Shutter (io) devices
* Added action card for quiet mode.
* Fix for Quiet Mode not working when switched off.

1.6.8.en: * Added Dutch translation for Quiet mode.

1.6.9.en: * Fix crash when adding new Roller Shutter Quiet (io).

1.6.10.en: * Added simulator to help debug devices.

1.6.11.en:
* Added My button to io:RollerShutterWithLowSpeedManagementIOComponent.
* Convert Up / Down commands to quiet move command for io:RollerShutterWithLowSpeedManagementIOComponent.

1.6.13.en:
* io:RollerShutterWithLowSpeedManagementIOComponent:
  * Reversed quite Up/Down.
  * Added quiet mode to My position.
* io:GarageOpenerIOComponent: Added position control.

1.6.14.en: * Added Dutch translation for My Position button and flow card

1.6.15.en: * io:RollerShutterWithLowSpeedManagementIOComponent: Fixed Move to My position flow card

1.6.19.en: * Fix possible error for old io:HorizontalAwningIOComponent

1.6.20.en:
* Changed setInterval to this.homey.setTimeout so missing responses that timeout don't overlap.
* Added Quick UI feature to most blinds and awnings so tile shows open close state and can toggle the state

1.6.21.en: * Added Lock State capability and flow trigger when io:PriorityLockOriginatorState is available

1.6.22.en: * Inverted io:AwningValanceIOComponent so Up/Down buttons match io:HorizontalAwningIOComponent when Extended / retracted.

1.6.23.en: * Fix error when tapping on the tile for the io roller shutters with slow speed.

1.6.24.en: * Tidy up to reduce app size

1.6.25.en:
* Optimized images sizes
* Converted to use axios library to reduce size and improve performance

2.0.1.en: * Added more detail to the generic error handler message.

2.0.2.en: * Fixed a possible error when the access token expires that could cause flows to fail. Added options to reverse the open / close directions of the controls for each cover device.

2.0.3.en: * Fixed options to reverse the open / close directions of the controls for each device. Added option to invert the tile action for cover devices that provide position information.

2.0.4.en: * Added options for alternate server addresses.

2.0.5.en: * Added options for new OAuth login.

2.0.7.en: Converted \setup endpoint to individual fetch in compliance with email from Somfy

2.0.8.en: Implemented Event method of updating capabilities

2.0.10.en: Fix missing return data after reauthenticating

2.0.11.en: Added flags to control startup sequence

2.0.12.en: Fix variable name error in app init.

2.0.13.en: Changed unhandledRejection report to show more information.

2.0.14.en: Fixed erroneous conversion of Open / Close state to int.

2.0.15.en: fixed event value issue with opening sensor and light controller sensor, added option to switch off Information log.

2.1.0.en: Reduced the load on the Somfy servers as per the email from Somfy. Added an option for new login method to fix issues with logging in to some accounts. Added extra log tabs for diagnostics.

2.1.1.en: Fix crash on old Homeys, Reduced the load on the Somfy servers as per the email from Somfy. Added an option for new login method to fix issues with logging in to some accounts. Added extra log tabs for diagnostics.

2.1.2.en: Fix crash on old Homeys, Reduced the load on the Somfy servers as per the email from Somfy. Added an option for new login method to fix issues with logging in to some accounts. Added extra log tabs for diagnostics. Fixed issue with expired access tokens.

2.1.3.en: App now automatically chooses the login method

2.1.4.en: Added flow card to switch polling on / off

2.1.5.en: Added flow card to change sync speed. Forced refresh of status if login token expires. Fix for idle state when cover is partially open

2.1.6.en: Added setting to switch off polling. Changes to polling mode and sync speed now show in app settings. Added Boost mode to temporarily increase polling speed when a cover command is sent. Added support for io:SimpleBioclimaticPergolaIOComponent

2.1.7.en: Added support for hue:GenericExtendedColorLightHUEComponent, hue:HueLuxHUEComponent, hue:ExtendedColorLightCandleHUEComponent, hue:LightStripsPlusHUEComponent, hue:ColorTemperatureLightBulbHUEComponent, io:DimmableLightIOComponent

2.1.8.en: Changed Sync Speed to Sync Interval. Limited size of Information log. Added io:DiscreteGarageOpenerWithPartialPositionIOComponent

2.1.11.en: Added io:LightMicroModuleSomfyIOComponent, rts:LightRTSComponent. Fixed dim and on/off cancelling each other. Improved boost sync to capture new command events when session had timed out

2.1.12.en: Delay sync flow actions if sync is currently boosted. Auto login method is now active all the time and not just when the credentials are saved

2.1.13.en: Temporarily removed oauth login as it is causing an issue with Somfy

2.1.16.en: Fix rts:LightRTSComponent and io:LightMicroModuleSomfyIOComponent controllable names.

2.1.17.en: Stopped rts:LightRTSComponent and io:LightMicroModuleSomfyIOComponent devices form send On command when dim set. Added ovp:SomfyPilotWireHeatingInterfaceOVPComponent and ovp:SomfyPilotWireTemperatureSensorOVPComponent.

2.1.19.en: Potential fix for failed login attempts at startup. Add logout when app is closed (during update, etc.)

2.1.23.en: Added io:OnOffIOComponent and myfox:HomeKeeperProAlarmController. Provides success feedback when sending logs.

2.1.26.en: Added rts:ExteriorVenetianBlindRTSComponent and set tilt position for exterior venetian blind

2.1.27.en: Added trigger and action flow cards for tilt.

2.1.28.en: Changed minimum interval to 30 seconds to comply with Somfy's conditions of use. Added Is Moving condition flow card for IO window covers.

2.1.29.en: Changed minimum interval to 30 seconds to comply with Somfy's conditions of use. Added Is Moving condition flow card for IO window covers.

2.1.30.en: Changed minimum interval to 30 seconds to comply with Somfy's conditions of use. Added Is Moving condition flow card for IO window covers.

2.1.31.en: The Poll for status updates action card will now start the polling immediately if possible, without breaking th 30 second rule. Added 'Once' option to the Poll for status updates action card. Changed lower limit on Polling Interval action card to 30 seconds.

2.1.32.en: Added the flow ID to the error message in the log generated by a flow error.

2.1.33.en: Fixed Motion has changed trigger error.

2.1.35.en: Added enocean:EnOceanOnOffLight as Two button On / Off.

2.1.37.en: Added Energy sensor, Atlantic Water Boiler, Atlantic Outside temperature sensor and Atlantic Zone temperature sensor

2.1.38.en: Added Atlantic Heating Zone, Atlantic Hot Water Tank

2.1.39.en: Added rts:ExteriorBlindRTSComponent and renamed 'Interior Blind (RTS)' to 'Blind (RTS)'

2.1.41.en: Added a watchdog to the alarm type capabilities to check if they switched off with notifying. Added 'io:AtlanticPassAPCZoneControlZoneComponent', 'io:CumulatedElectricalEnergyConsumptionIOSystemDeviceSensor' and  'io:TemperatureInCelciusIOSystemDeviceSensor'

2.1.42.en: Add KeyGo remote. Added MY position to io:RollerShutterGenericIOComponent. Fixed a typo in io:IORemoteController that would stop the initial state being set

2.1.43.en: Fix 'stop' button sending null as the command.

2.1.44.en: Added Atlantic Main Zone Controller and Atlantic Hot Water Production

2.1.48.en: Added io sliding gate. Fixed a potential lock up of the event registration process. When polling is switched back on, it now refreshes all the capabilities as they might have changed while not polling.

2.1.50.en: Fixes to clear Lockstate when it no longer appears in the state data.

2.1.51.en: Fix to clear Lockstate when it no longer appears in the state data.

2.1.52.en: Fixed inconsistent naming of a function.

2.1.53.en: Fixed issue that stops some controls from updating if polling is switched off.

2.1.55.en: Added dirty and battery alarms to smoke detectors. Changed login screen text to make it clearer that the details are for both Tahoma and Connexoon. Fixed error when clearing login details.

2.1.56.en: Fix for potential issue when polling is dissabled that could prevent starting it again.

2.1.57.en: Extended lockout period after a failed authentication to prevent re-triggering Somfy's temporary account lock out

2.1.58.en: Added extra logging to track down a user problem

2.1.64.en: Added Lock State to the Exterior blind (io)

2.1.65.en: Added Lock State to the Velux Roof Window

2.1.66.en: Added support for the io:RollerShutterUnoIOComponent to the Roller shutter (io) device

2.1.67.en: Added Command Complete flow trigger. Optimized logging. Fixed an error when event data had no value

2.1.68.en: Fixed completely skipping event data if a duplicate exists

2.1.69.en: Added retry to failed commands. Abort previous shutter command when a new command arrives before previous one is complete. Deprecates global command complete and replaced it with device command complete.

2.1.73.en: Added Siren IO (io:SomfyIndoorSimpleSirenIOComponent). Added Tahoma / Connexoon hub (internal:PodV2Component and internal:PodMiniComponent) for switch schedule / timer on and off. Added Tahoma Alarm (internal:TSKAlarmComponent)

2.1.74.en: Added Heater (io:DiscreteExteriorHeatingIOComponent). Fixed an issue with the io valve.

2.1.75.en: Fix a bug introduced in the last version

2.1.76.en: Fix Hub > Timer / Schedule action cards.

3.0.0.en: Updated to SDK 3 and made cloud ready.

3.0.1.en: Fix logo on pairing wizards credentials screen.

3.0.2.en: Updated to SDK 3 and made cloud ready. Fix login issues. Fix bad capability.

3.0.3.en: Updated to SDK 3 and made cloud ready. Fix login issues. Fix bad capability. Fix authentication issue after session timeout

3.0.4.en: Updated to SDK 3 and made cloud ready. Fix contact changed flow trigger. Added extra checks for validating objects

3.0.5.en: Fixed crash due to a missed SDK3 conversion

3.0.6.en: Fixed Heat On / Off command. Added rts:SwingingShutterRTSComponent and rts:OnOffRTSComponent

3.0.10.en: Added extra parameter validation and error handling

3.0.11.en: Added support for Velux products: ogp:window, ogp:shutter and ogp:light

3.0.14.en: Fixed an issue with sending some commands (including smoke alarm test)

3.0.16.en: Added more lights hue:BloomHUEComponent, hue:HueSpotHUEComponent, hue:HueLampHUEComponent. Added Event log page to show Tahoma events.

3.0.17.en: Added more lights zwave:OnOffLightZWaveComponent, zwave:OnOffZWaveComponent. Add Hitachi AC. Added battery alarm to SunIo, Opening Detector (io) and Temperature Sensor (io).

3.0.18.en: Fix for AC so it fetches the current status when added or when the app starts up. Fix the fan speed command value to be 'hi' and 'lo'

3.0.19.en: Various fixes for the AC device

3.0.22.en: Added sliding Pergola io:PergolaRailGuidedAwningIOComponent and the Homekit hub.

3.0.23.en: Fix for Un-Boost when polling not enabled.

3.0.24.en: Fix for some devices not boosting polling.

3.0.25.en: Changed back to standard capability for RTS curtains and blinds so they are compatible with Google Home.

3.0.27.en: New device icons provided by Athom

3.0.28.en: Added support for 'io:CyclicGarageOpenerIOComponent', 'io:CyclicSlidingGateOpenerIOComponent', 'rts:GarageDoorRTSComponent' and 'io:RollerShutterWithBatterySomfyIOComponent'. Added upper limit on polling interval of 90 seconds to prevent timeouts

3.0.30.en: Clean up settings and set maximum polling limit. Improved recovery from event fetch error.

3.0.31.en: Added Danfoss Icon Thermostat (zigbee:DanfossHeatingFloorComponent). Added 'eliot:OnOffSwitchEliotComponent', 'eliot:OnOffLightEliotComponent', 'eliot:DimmerLightEliotComponent', 'eliot:ElectricVehicleChargerComponent', io:AtlanticElectricalHeaterIOComponent

3.0.32.en: Split io:AtlanticElectricalHeaterIOComponent to new IO Heating Interface device so it has the correct levels.

3.0.33.en: Removed invalid options from io:AtlanticElectricalHeaterIOComponent levels. Added 'io:SwitchMicroModuleSomfyIOComponent' to the Socket (RTS & io) device.

3.0.34.en: Added Move to MY position flow action card to devices that were missing it.

4.0.0.en: Re-write to work with local and cloud access.

4.0.1.en: Fix for 'can’t read properties of null' when local access is not registered. Boost no longer activated for local access.

4.0.2.en: Added alternate url for certificate validation (SNI).

4.0.3.en: Send device log to stdout to assist adding / debugging devices on Homey.

4.0.4.en: Send device log to stdout to assist adding / debugging devices on Homey.

4.0.5.en: Another attemp at better debugging information for diagnostic logs on Homey.

4.0.7.en: Added support for ogp:Blind (RTS) to 'Blind or Shutter (RTS)' device

4.0.8.en: Fix for radiator valve when using local access. Change log function for Homey compatibility

4.0.9.en: Added Heating Mode Changed and Set Heating Mode flow cards to the Pilot Wire programmer

4.0.10.en: Added Heating Mode Changed and Set Heating Mode flow cards to the IO Heating Interface

4.0.11.en: Fixed a couple of Date issues

4.0.12.en: Add setting to set the class type for window covering, etc.

4.0.13.en: Fix issue with diagnostic GetDevices when no local connection is available.

4.0.14.en: Added ogp:GarageDoor to RTS Gate / Garage door.

4.0.15.en: Log device fetch when adding a device to this.homey.log to see if it will be captured by the built in diagnostic report.

4.0.16.en: Added ogp:gate under 'Gate / Garage Door Opener (RTS)'.

4.0.19.en: Added io:DualRollerShutterIOComponent under 'Dual Shutters'. Fixed issue where some local device commands were sent via the cloud.

4.0.20.en: Added Action Flow cards for the 'Dual Shutters'

4.0.22.en: Fixed a couple of issues that could cause a crash. Added Flow Action cards for Thermostat set temperature

4.0.23.en: Added support for io:VenetianBlindIOComponent and renamed Exterior Venetian Blind to Venetian Blind as it covers both types.

4.0.24.en: Added support for io:DynamicRollerShutterIOComponent under 'Roller shutter (io)'. Added support for io:SunEnergyActuatorSensor under 'Sunis sun sensor (io)'

4.0.25.en: Improved error message when no local mode detected. Added eliot:EliotElectricEnergyConsumptionSensor, eliot:RollerShutterEliotComponent, eliot:RemoteEliotComponent. Copied io:DynamicRollerShutterIOComponent to Roller shutter with quiet mode (io).

4.0.26.en: Added support for zigbee:ProfaluxRollerShutterComponent under 'Roller shutter (io)'.

4.0.27.en: Fixed an issue introduced in 4.0.25 where a successful request would report a failure.

4.0.28.en: Fixed for Homey 2023 to resolve path to local certificate.

4.0.30.en: Added flow action card to set pedestrian position for sliding gate. Fix command for Pilot Wire Programmer operating mode.

4.0.31.en: Changed login backoff routine to try an fix cloud IP block.

4.0.32.en: Added option to select the Somfy server region to support Australian users.

4.0.33.en: Fix translations. Fix issue in error handler.

4.0.35.en: Fix bug introduced in last version.

4.0.36.en: Fix annomolies that were left over from old login rate limitation method.

4.0.37.en: Fix annomolies that were left over from old login rate limitation method.

4.0.38.en: Added support for ogp:Curtain to 'Interior Curtain (RTS)'.

4.0.39.en: Added support for io:DiscreteGarageOpenerIOComponent to 'Garage Door - Open and Close (io)'.

4.0.42.en: Added MY button to 'Exterior blind (io)'.Added 'ogp:blind' 'Exterior blind (io)'.

4.0.43.en: Add Tilted and Openned capabilities to enocean window handle.

4.0.44.en: Fixes for Tilted and Openned capabilities in enocean window handle.

4.0.45.en: Fix for Openned capabilities in enocean window handle.

4.0.46.en: Enabled Lock State for all 'Awning / Pergola (io)' devices .

4.0.48.en: Process cloud events even when device is local.

4.0.49.en: Compare lockstate timer as a string.

4.0.50.en: Fix typo for 'io:PriorityLockTimerState' that should be 'core:PriorityLockTimerState'.

4.0.51.en: Update logging information to help track down occasional log in problem.

4.0.52.en: Fixed an issue with the Pilot Wire Programmer device. Attempt to send commands via the cloud if local fails

4.0.53.en: Centralised information logging for more consistent logging. Added support for 'rts:BottomUpBlindRTSComponent' and 'rts:TopDownBlindRTSComponent' to 'Blind or Shutter (RTS)'.

4.0.54.en: Fix for Lock State timing out after 1 mimute.

4.0.55.en: Fix call to missing lock state function.

4.0.57.en: Fix for Openned capability in enocean window handle.

4.0.58.en: Fix for Openned capability in enocean window handle for events.

4.0.59.en: Fix 2 for Openned capability in enocean window handle for events.

4.0.60.en: Added Protexial Alarm. Fixed Mt button for Exterior blind (io)

4.0.61.en: Change Protexial Alarm zone command method

4.0.62.en: Fix 2 for Protexial Alarm zone command. Added Flow actions for Protexial Alarm

4.0.63.en: Trying to turn off zones in the Protexial Alarm now shows an error message.

4.0.64.en: Add My position to 'Exterior blind (io)'. Add missing Address change callback for mDNS.

4.0.65.en: Fix 3 for Protexial Alarm zone command.

4.0.66.en: Clean up settings pages. More diagnostics for login errors. Fire login in sync loop if not logged in. Added zigbee:RollerShutterGenericComponent to 'Roller shutter (io)'

4.0.68.en: Check for duplicate commands sooner in the process to prevent duplicate commands being sent. RTS Open / Close commands now cleared when the command complete event is received. Reduced number of Information log entries

4.0.69.en: Added External Heater 'rts:ExteriorHeatingRTSComponent' to 'Light / Heater with timer (RTS)'

4.0.74.en: Possible fix for multiple zone triggers being sent for multiple contact sensors that are operated simultaneously.

4.0.76.en: Added Trigger card for Protexial Alarm state change.

4.0.78.en: Retry failed local login. Added 'ogp:GarageDoor' to 'Garage Door - Open and Close (io)'

4.0.79.en: Fix issue with getting a new local token. Fix issue from last update that tried to do a local login when no bridge was detected.

4.0.83.en: Added Nudge Flow action for RTS blinds. Added Position capability to io:SlidingGateOpenerIOComponent.

4.0.87.en: Added 'Silent Mode' to Velux roller shutter(io) if the state is available.

4.0.88.en: Fix missing quiet_mode capability for Roller shutter with quiet mode (io).

4.0.90.en: Added Flow triggers for Started amd Stopped raining
